itunes:title: Pua Traditions (with Makanani Salā)
title: Pua Traditions (with Makanani Salā)
description:
Which side do you wear your flower, and does it matter? Why should pregnant women only receive open lei? And what is a leg reader? Makanani Salā, director of the Mayor's Office of Culture and the Arts, sits down with Ron to discuss our many pua (flower) traditions.

Support the show
